h.description:
HomeKit Visibility

If this option is set to 0 the service will become invisible to HomeKit but will still function as a service. Its hardware will be fully functional, as well as its status. All actions will function as normal too.

oneOf.description: Service is not added to HomeKit
Service is hidden in Apple Home App, but is showed in HAA Home Manager and compatible Apps. It must be used with Services into Extra Services array.
